channel.title: Comments on: SQL Saturday #187 – Richmond, VA
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Sam Vanga
item.dc:creator: Sam Vanga
item.description: Howard - It was great to catch up with you as well. I echo your comments. It was a terrific experience!
item.content:encoded: Howard – It was great to catch up with you as well. I echo your comments. It was a terrific experience!

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: Yes, I will be much better prepared for the next one I attend. Plus, it is nice to see and meet people whom you follow online and have learned so much from - at least in my case, anyway. :-)
item.content:encoded: Yes, I will be much better prepared for the next one I attend. Plus, it is nice to see and meet people whom you follow online and have learned so much from – at least in my case, anyway. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: I am glad you enjoyed it. I have been to a couple of SQL Saturday events in NYC and must say they have been very worthwhile. The opportunities for networking are fantastic at these events
item.content:encoded: I am glad you enjoyed it. I have been to a couple of SQL Saturday events in NYC and must say they have been very worthwhile. The opportunities for networking are fantastic at these events
